faqs.question: When to Apply for 'Skim Rebat Cukai Taksiran Bagi Pemilik Rumah Mesra Alam Hijau Berkarbon Rendah Petaling Jaya' 2020?
faqs.answer: 'Skim Rebat Cukai Taksiran Bagi Pemilik Rumah Mesra Alam Hijau Berkarbon Rendah Petaling Jaya 2020 can be applied from 1 April 2020 until 24 July 2020'

faqs.question: How do I apply for 'Skim Rebat Cukai Taksiran Bagi Pemilik Rumah Mesra Alam Hijau Berkarbon Rendah Petaling Jaya' 2020?
faqs.answer:
You can make an application for 'Skim Rebat Cukai Taksiran Bagi Pemilik Rumah
Mesra Alam Hijau Berkarbon Rendah Petaling Jaya' 2020 from:

Online Application
a. eRebat application by downloading from Playstore / App Store on your mobile phone

faqs.question: Who is applicable to apply for 'Skim Rebat Cukai Taksiran Bagi Pemilik Rumah Mesra Alam Hijau Berkarbon Rendah Petaling Jaya' 2020?
What are the eligibility criteria for the applicant for 'Skim Rebat Cukai Taksiran Bagi Pemilik Rumah Mesra Alam Hijau Berkarbon Rendah Petaling Jaya' 2020?
faqs.answer:
Applicant for 'Skim Rebat Cukai Taksiran Bagi Pemilik Rumah Mesra Alam Hijau Berkarbon Rendah Petaling Jaya' 2020 must meet the following criteria:
a.The home must be occupied by the original owner
b. A rent house is NOT eligible to apply
c. There is no overdue assessment tax
